content: mrs smink designs *** northsea socks *** sizes 0 3 3 9 / 9 18 months circumference 13 5 15 / 16 5 cm 5 3 5 9 / 6 5 inch length from heel to toe 7 5 9 5 / 12 cm 3 3 7 / 4 7 inch needles 4 dpnt 5 mm us 8 needles yarn phildar partner 6 bleuet gauge 10 x 10 cm / 2 5 x 2 5 inch 14 sts and 24 row measured over stockinette stich using 5 mm needle techniques toe-up using judy s magic cast on a lot of instructional videos on this cast on method are available on youtube m1r = right slanting increase insert right hand needle from back to front into right leg of stich 1 row beneath next row place loop on left hand needle and knit the picked up loop is twisted to prevent holes m1l = left slanting increase insert left hand needle from back to front into left leg of previous stitch 2 row beneath previous row knit loop short row to prevent holes in the piece while shaping our heel we wrap 1 stitch at the end of our row rs knit the number of sts until 1 stitch remains on left hand needle slip this stitch purl wise from left hand needle to right hand needle move the yarn between the needles to the front of the work slip the same stich back to the left needle move the yarn to the back of work = one wrapped st made turn ws purl the purl stitches until 1 stitch remains on left hand needle slip st purl wise move yarn to back of the work slip st back to left hand needle place yarn back to the front turn toe using 5 mm needles and judy s magic cast on cast on 10 10 /12 sts round 1 and 2 knit round 3 knit 1 m1r knit 3 3 / 4 m1l knit 2 m1r knit 3 3 / 4 m1r knit 1 total of 14 14 / 16 sts round 4 knit round 5 knit 1 m1r knit 5 5 /6 m1l knit 2 m1r knit 5 5 / 6 m1l knit 1 total of 18 18 / 20 sts round 6 knit round 7 size 0 3 months knit round 7 sizes 3 9 and 9 18 months work another round with 4 increases 24 sts foot continue knitting all 18 22 / 24 sts until total length of 6 7 / 9 cm 2 4 2 8 / 3 5 inch heel knit 9 11 / 12 work short row over next 9 11 / 12 sts knit 8 10 / 11 wrap 1 turn continue working short row until 5 5 / 6 sts remain unwrapped with right side facing knit short row sts until first wrapped stitch slip st to right hand needle with left hand needle pick up the wrap collar around the wrapped
